member.name: M:kCura.Data.RowDataGateway.Helper.FillDataAdapterWaitForDeadlocks(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter,System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Attempts to execute the specified command to fill the provided with the provided and retries up to times if the command errors out with a deadlock error. Note that this data adapter should not be used for any command used in the scope of a transaction as the transaction is abandoned after a deadlock is encountered.
member.param: The data adapter to fill. This adapter's command should not be in the scope of a transaction.
The data table to fill with the results from the data adapter.
member.remarks: TODO: This should throw an exception if given a data adapter that has a transaction.
